      • messageTitle

        public java.lang.String messageTitle(java.lang.String title,
                                     org.bukkit.ChatColor textColor,
                                     org.bukkit.ChatColor dashColor)
        Calculates the amount of dashes needed to fill the line, and returns a message title line with the title in textColor surrounded in dashes in dashColor.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to display
        textColor - the color of the title text
        dashColor - the color of the dashes
        Returns:
        the title header

      • messageTrail

        Returns a trail of dashes with the specified color
        Parameters:
        color - the ChatColor of the dashes
        Returns:
        a line of dashes as a message footer

      • assembleMessage

        public java.lang.String assembleMessage(java.lang.String[] args,
                                        int start,
                                        int end)
        Compile arguments from start to end into a String message.
        Parameters:
        args - the Array of Strings to compile
        start - the start index in the Array
        end - the end index in the Array. The message does not include the String at this index (works like substring())
        Returns:
        a String of all of the String arguments from start to end
